content.overview:
We plan on landing a few changes to the Attribution Reporting API focused on:
-Increasing limits on registration data size to allow more flexibility
-Removing non-privacy-bearing browser-imposed delay to allow reports to be received faster

Spec changes
-Remove aggregation keys size limit on trigger registration
-Remove 1-hour delay between end of report window and transmission
